Html:
Hi Radioman,

I downloaded the GMaps-bundle in January this year and it works like a charm:) I have a question, though, which is related to the GMapMarker class: I'm not able to find the IsVisible property (I'm using the WPF-version). Is there a later version released?

Cheers,
/Peter

*UPDATE*
I downloaded the latest WPF-version and had a look at the GMapMarker class an noticed that the class doesn't have an IsVisible property either. If this is omitted in the WPF-version for a particular reason, is there a preferred work-around? I've tried an approach but ran into an "interesting" side-effect whereas a marker fails to show although "it is there" in the MapControl.Markers collection...
